She
               
              sounded
               
              almost
               
              at
               
              my
               
              pleasing
               
              tale
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
And
               
              for
               
              my
               
              tidings
               
              gave
               
              me
               
              twenty
               
              kisses
              .

speaker: GOTH
text:
What
              ,
               
              canst
               
              thou
               
              say
               
              all
               
              this
               
              and
               
              never
               
              blush
              ?

speaker: AARON
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              like
               
              a
               
              black
               
              dog
              ,
               
              as
               
              the
               
              saying
               
              is
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Art
               
              thou
               
              not
               
              sorry
               
              for
               
              these
               
              heinous
               
              deeds
              ?

speaker: AARON
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              that
               
              I
               
              had
               
              not
               
              done
               
              a
               
              thousand
               
              more
              .

speaker: AARON
text:
Even
               
              now
               
              I
               
              curse
               
              the
               
              day
              —
              and
               
              yet
              ,
               
              I
               
              think
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
Few
               
              come
               
              within
               
              the
               
              compass
               
              of
               
              my
               
              curse
              —

speaker: AARON
text:
Wherein
               
              I
               
              did
               
              not
               
              some
               
              notorious
               
              ill
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
As
               
              kill
               
              a
               
              man
              ,
               
              or
               
              else
               
              devise
               
              his
               
              death
              ;

speaker: AARON
text:
Ravish
               
              a
               
              maid
               
              or
               
              plot
               
              the
               
              way
               
              to
               
              do
               
              it
              ;

speaker: AARON
text:
Accuse
               
              some
               
              innocent
               
              and
               
              forswear
               
              myself
              ;

speaker: AARON
text:
Set
               
              deadly
               
              enmity
               
              between
               
              two
               
              friends
              ;

speaker: AARON
text:
Make
               
              poor
               
              men’s
               
              cattle
               
              break
               
              their
               
              necks
              ;

speaker: AARON
text:
Set
               
              fire
               
              on
               
              barns
               
              and
               
              haystalks
               
              in
               
              the
               
              night
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
And
               
              bid
               
              the
               
              owners
               
              quench
               
              them
               
              with
               
              their
               
              tears
              .

speaker: AARON
text:
Oft
               
              have
               
              I
               
              digged
               
              up
               
              dead
               
              men
               
              from
               
              their
               
              graves

speaker: AARON
text:
And
               
              set
               
              them
               
              upright
               
              at
               
              their
               
              dear
               
              friends’
               
              door
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
Even
               
              when
               
              their
               
              sorrows
               
              almost
               
              was
               
              forgot
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
And
               
              on
               
              their
               
              skins
              ,
               
              as
               
              on
               
              the
               
              bark
               
              of
               
              trees
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
Have
               
              with
               
              my
               
              knife
               
              carvèd
               
              in
               
              Roman
               
              letters

speaker: AARON
text:
“
              Let
               
              not
               
              your
               
              sorrow
               
              die
              ,
               
              though
               
              I
               
              am
               
              dead
              .
              ”

speaker: AARON
text:
But
               
              I
               
              have
               
              done
               
              a
               
              thousand
               
              dreadful
               
              things

speaker: AARON
text:
As
               
              willingly
               
              as
               
              one
               
              would
               
              kill
               
              a
               
              fly
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
And
               
              nothing
               
              grieves
               
              me
               
              heartily
               
              indeed

speaker: AARON
text:
But
               
              that
               
              I
               
              cannot
               
              do
               
              ten
               
              thousand
               
              more
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Bring
               
              down
               
              the
               
              devil
              ,
               
              for
               
              he
               
              must
               
              not
               
              die

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
So
               
              sweet
               
              a
               
              death
               
              as
               
              hanging
               
              presently
              .

speaker: AARON
text:
If
               
              there
               
              be
               
              devils
              ,
               
              would
               
              I
               
              were
               
              a
               
              devil
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
To
               
              live
               
              and
               
              burn
               
              in
               
              everlasting
               
              fire
              ,

speaker: AARON
text:
So
               
              I
               
              might
               
              have
               
              your
               
              company
               
              in
               
              hell

speaker: AARON
text:
But
               
              to
               
              torment
               
              you
               
              with
               
              my
               
              bitter
               
              tongue
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Sirs
              ,
               
              stop
               
              his
               
              mouth
              ,
               
              and
               
              let
               
              him
               
              speak
               
              no
               
              more
              .

speaker: GOTH
text:
My
               
              lord
              ,
               
              there
               
              is
               
              a
               
              messenger
               
              from
               
              Rome

speaker: GOTH
text:
Desires
               
              to
               
              be
               
              admitted
               
              to
               
              your
               
              presence
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Let
               
              him
               
              come
               
              near
              .

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Welcome
              ,
               
              Aemilius
              .
               
              What’s
               
              the
               
              news
               
              from
               
              Rome
              ?

speaker: AEMILIUS
text:
Lord
               
              Lucius
              ,
               
              and
               
              you
               
              princes
               
              of
               
              the
               
              Goths
              ,

speaker: AEMILIUS
text:
The
               
              Roman
               
              Emperor
               
              greets
               
              you
               
              all
               
              by
               
              me
              ;

speaker: AEMILIUS
text:
And
              ,
               
              for
               
              he
               
              understands
               
              you
               
              are
               
              in
               
              arms
              ,

speaker: AEMILIUS
text:
He
               
              craves
               
              a
               
              parley
               
              at
               
              your
               
              father’s
               
              house
              ,

speaker: AEMILIUS
text:
Willing
               
              you
               
              to
               
              demand
               
              your
               
              hostages
              ,

speaker: AEMILIUS
text:
And
               
              they
               
              shall
               
              be
               
              immediately
               
              delivered
              .

speaker: GOTH
text:
What
               
              says
               
              our
               
              general
              ?

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Aemilius
              ,
               
              let
               
              the
               
              Emperor
               
              give
               
              his
               
              pledges

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
Unto
               
              my
               
              father
               
              and
               
              my
               
              uncle
               
              Marcus
              ,

speaker: LUCIUS
text:
And
               
              we
               
              will
               
              come
              .
               
              March
               
              away
              .
